data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alain de Chambrier, Carlos Daniel Pinacho-Pinacho, Jesus Servando Hernández-Orts, Tomáš Scholz (2017): A New Genus And Two New Species Of Proteocephalidean Tapeworms (Cestoda) From Cichlid Fish (Perciformes: Cichlidae) In The Neotropics. J. Parasitol. 103 (1): 83-94, DOI: 10.1645/16-84
